title: A New Apt in Grapevine**Entertainment at Door Step**
posting_body: A Luxury and Chic Apartment in Grapevine and Minutes to DFW Airport.
The Property has Views of Grapevine Lake, Walking Distance to Shopping, Movie Theater, Dining, and Entertainment.
Enjoy the Luxury of Granite Countertops and Stainless Steel Appliances in the Kitchen.
Wood Floors, Walk-In Closets, and Garden Tubs in Your Chic Apartment Home.
Relax in the Resort Style Swimming Pool with Tanning Deck, or Exercise in the State of the Art Fitness Center, They even Have a Bark (Dog) Park for Your Furry Friend, and a Gated Community!
Please Call Jacquelyn with Dash Realty for More Information at
**12 Month Lease or Longer, No Corporate Leases, and No Sublease**
